mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM output o JOIN user u ON u.uid = o.user_id WHERE o.status = '대기중' AND o.release_date = CURDATE() AND u.id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM output o JOIN user u ON u.uid = o.user_id WHERE o.status = '승인' AND o.release_date = CURDATE() AND u.id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM output o JOIN user u ON u.uid = o.user_id WHERE o.status = '거절' AND o.release_date = CURDATE() AND u.id = #{userId}
SELECT SUM(release_quantity) FROM output o JOIN user u ON u.uid = o.user_id WHERE MONTH(release_date) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND o.status = '승인' AND u.id = #{userId}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.release_date, '%m') AS releaseMonth, SUM(o.release_quantity) AS releaseQuantity FROM output o JOIN user u ON u.uid = o.user_id WHERE o.release_date IS NOT NULL And o.status = '승인' AND u.id = #{userId} GROUP BY releaseMonth ORDER BY releaseMonth;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.release_date, '%m') AS releaseMonth, SUM(o.release_quantity * unit_price) AS releasePrice FROM output o JOIN user u ON u.uid = o.user_id WHERE o.release_date IS NOT NULL And o.status = '승인' AND u.id = #{userId} GROUP BY releaseMonth ORDER BY releaseMonth;

SELECT p.product_name, SUM(o.release_quantity) AS totalQuantity FROM product p JOIN output o ON o.product_code = p.product_code JOIN user u ON u.uid = o.user_id WHERE o.status = '승인' AND u.id = #{userId} GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY totalQuantity DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT SUM(warehoused_quantity) FROM input WHERE warehoused_date = CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT SUM(release_quantity) FROM output WHERE release_date = CURRENT_DATE() AND status = '승인'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM output WHERE status = '대기중' AND release_date = CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(warehoused_date, '%m') AS warehousedMonth, SUM(warehoused_quantity) AS warehousedQuantity FROM input GROUP BY warehousedMonth ORDER BY warehousedMonth

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(release_date, '%m') AS releaseMonth, SUM(release_quantity) AS releaseQuantity FROM output WHERE release_date IS NOT NULL AND status = '승인' GROUP BY releaseMonth ORDER BY releaseMonth
SELECT sum(release_quantity) AS releaseQuantity, user_id FROM output WHERE status = '승인' GROUP BY user_id

SELECT i.input_num, m.manufacturer_name, p.product_code, p.product_name, i.warehoused_quantity FROM input i JOIN manufacture m ON i.manufacturer_code = m.manufacturer_code JOIN product p ON i.product_code = p.product_code WHERE warehoused_date = CURRENT_DATE;
